name: The New Front
description:
A game created in a week by me and my artist friend at Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

Web Build WITH NO CHANGES(Play with fullscreen): https://wexseven.github.io/The-New-Front/

In the game you have to defend against the onslaught of enemies, but then there is an interesting twist once the onslaught is over.

- All of the characters were drawn by a friend of mine(Yaroslava Kovalchuk), as well as the tileset for the game
- Animations, scripts and UI made by me.
- Other assets from freeware sources.
- Balance decisions are questionable))
- We did not have time to do a full error-check.
